gw.api.graph

Interface EdgeFactory<T>


  • public interface EdgeFactory<T>
    Interface for graph edge creation, where T is the type of the node.
    Author:
    bspies

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge<T> createEdge(T source, T target)
      Creates and edge between the source and target (no weight).
      AttributeEdge<T> createEdge(T source, T target, java.lang.Object attribute)
      Creates an edge between the given source and target with the given attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • createEdge

        AttributeEdge<T> createEdge(T source,
                          T target,
                          java.lang.Object attribute)
        Creates an edge between the given source and target with the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        source - The source node
        target - The target node
        attribute - The edge attribute
        Returns:
        The created edge
